title: What are Blackpink fans called? - Quora

response.answer_text: The fandom name Blink means that we start with Black Pink and end with Black Pink. (BL)ACK P(INK) - BLINK Other names: 블링크 Type: Fandom Founded: January 14th, 2017 Founder: BLACKPINK Location: Worldwide Key people: BLACKPINK The word BLINK is a combination of the words "bl/ack" and "p/ink". The members themselves of BLACKPINK supposedly came up with this name. The fandom name means that we start with Black Pink and end with Black Pink. On January 14, 2017, BLACKPINK released an image on their official Instagram account. Fans questioned the word shown - "BLINK" - and a few days after the name was confirmed. Stay Safe ~yena

I am not a blink but I just know this stuff- blink- a fan of blackpink. They like all the members equally and even though you have a BIAS (liking a member more but you still like the other members) that's ok you're still considered a blink but you only like 3/2/1 member then your not a blink. Blinks who like all the members (even with a bias) are called true blinks! here there are two blinks- international and Korean. this not only for blackpink but for all the kpop groups in general.
